languages.text: "В те дни я воочию увидел все бесстыдное уродство греха. Я раскаялся в своей гордыне, оставил пост префекта и стал бродячим миссионером. С тех пор я таков. Что же касается моего мира... Спустя двадцать лет священная {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиция{/g} предала его очищению пламенем".

traits.locale_text: "В те дни я воочию увидел все бесстыдное уродство греха. Я раскаялся в своей гордыне, оставил пост префекта и стал бродячим миссионером. С тех пор я таков. Что же касается моего мира... Спустя двадцать лет священная Инквизиция предала его очищению пламенем".

languages.text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."
languages.original_text: "В те дни я воочию увидел все бесстыдное уродство греха. Я раскаялся в своей гордыне, оставил пост префекта и стал бродячим миссионером. С тех пор я таков. Что же касается моего мира... Спустя двадцать лет священная {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиция{/g} предала его очищению пламенем".

traits.locale_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of sin. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a traveling missionary. I've been one since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the holy Inquisition consigned it to purifying flames."

"In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of sin. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a traveling missionary. I've been one since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the holy Inquisition consigned it to purifying flames."

"In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of sin. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the holy Inquisition consigned it to purifying flames."

"In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of sin. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the holy Inquisition consigned it to purifying flames."

"In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

languages.text: “在那段日子里，我亲眼见到了我的灵魂有多么罪恶、无耻。我忏悔了我的傲慢，离开了最高行政官的位置，成为了一名四处游荡的传教士。自那之后，我便一直担任着传教士的职位。至于我的世界……在我离开的二十年后，它在神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}净化的烈焰之中化为灰烬。”
languages.original_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: “在那段日子里，我亲眼见到了罪恶无耻的丑态。我忏悔了我的傲慢，离开了最高行政官的位置，成为了一名四处游荡的传教士。自那之后，我便一直担任着传教士的职位。至于我的世界……在我离开的二十年后，它在神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}净化的烈焰之中化为灰烬。”

languages.text: «Por aquel entonces, vi con mis propios ojos el horror que puede albergar un alma. Me arrepentí de mi arrogancia, abandoné el puesto de prefecto y emprendí mi viaje como misionero. Desde entonces, no he sido otra cosa. 20 años después, la Santa {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} imbuyó mi mundo de llamas purificadoras».
languages.original_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: «Por aquel entonces, vi con mis propios ojos el horror del pecado. Me arrepentí de mi arrogancia, abandoné el puesto de prefecto y emprendí mi viaje como misionero. Desde entonces, no he sido otra cosa. 20 años después, la Santa {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} imbuyó mi mundo de llamas purificadoras».

languages.text: 「己の魂の恥知らずな醜さに気づいたのはその時です。私は自分の傲慢さを悔い改め、知事の職を辞し、さすらいの伝道者となりました。当時から現在までそのような生活を送っています。そして、我が故郷は…20年後、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}が浄化の炎で焼き尽くしました」
languages.original_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: 「己の罪の恥知らずな醜さに気づいたのはその時です。私は自分の傲慢さを悔い改め、知事の職を辞し、さすらいの伝道者となりました。当時から現在までそのような生活を送っています。そして、我が故郷は…20年後、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}が浄化の炎で焼き尽くしました」

languages.text: "In jenen Tagen sah ich mit eigenen Augen die schamlose Hässlichkeit der Seele. Ich bereute meinen Hochmut, gab den Posten des Präfekten auf und wurde ein reisender Missionar. Und das bin ich seitdem auch geblieben. Und was meine Welt angeht ... Zwanzig Jahre später übergab die heilige {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} sie den reinigenden Flammen."
languages.original_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: "In jenen Tagen sah ich mit eigenen Augen die schamlose Hässlichkeit der Sünde. Ich bereute meinen Hochmut, gab den Posten des Präfekten auf und wurde ein reisender Missionar. Und das bin ich seitdem auch geblieben. Und was meine Welt angeht ... zwanzig Jahre später übergab die heilige {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} sie den reinigenden Flammen."

languages.text: « À cette époque, j'ai vu de mes yeux la laideur honteuse de l'âme. J'ai demandé pardon pour mon orgueil et abandonné le poste de préfet pour devenir missionnaire itinérant, ce que je suis encore aujourd'hui. Quant à mon monde... Vingt ans plus tard, la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sainte Inquisition{/g} l'a fait purifier par les flammes. »
languages.original_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: « À cette époque, j'ai vu de mes yeux la laideur honteuse du péché. J'ai demandé pardon pour mon orgueil et abandonné le poste de préfet pour devenir missionnaire itinérant, ce que je suis encore aujourd'hui. Quant à mon monde... Vingt ans plus tard, la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sainte Inquisition{/g} l'a fait purifier par les flammes. »

languages.text: "Ruhun arlanmaz çirkinliğine işte o günlerde tanık oldum. Kibrimi bir kenara bırakıp tövbe ettim, prefektlik makamından ayrıldım ve gezgin bir misyoner oldum. O gün bugündür de öyleyim. Dünyama gelince... Yirmi yıl sonra Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g}, onu arındırıcı alevlere mahkûm etti."
languages.original_text: "In those days, I saw with my own eyes the shameless ugliness of the soul. I repented of my hubris, left the position of prefect, and became a travelling missionary. I have been one ever since. As for my world... Twenty years later, the Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} consigned it to purifying flames."

traits.locale_text: "O günlerde ruhun utanmazlığını ve çirkinliğini kendi gözlerimle gördüm. Kibrimi bir kenara bırakıp tövbe ettim, başkanlığı bıraktım ve gezgin bir misyoner oldum. O gün bugündür de öyleyim. Dünyam ise... Yirmi yıl sonra Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} onun arındırıcı alevlere layık olduğuna kanaat getirdi."
